name: WithTop.coe_sum
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : Type u_2
inst✝ : AddCommMonoid α
s : Finset ι
f : ι → α
⊢ Eq (↑(s.sum fun i => f i)) (s.sum fun i => ↑(f i))
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast] lemma coe_sum (s : Finset ι) (f : ι → α) :
    ∑ i ∈ s, f i = ∑ i ∈ s, (f i : WithTop α) := map_sum addHom f s

name: WithTop.sum_eq_top
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : Type u_2
inst✝ : AddCommMonoid α
s : Finset ι
f : ι → WithTop α
⊢ Iff (Eq (s.sum fun i => f i) Top.top) (Exists fun i => And (Membership.mem s i) (Eq (f i) Top.top))
decl:
/-- A sum is infinite iff one term is infinite. -/
@[simp] lemma sum_eq_top : ∑ i ∈ s, f i = ⊤ ↔ ∃ i ∈ s, f i = ⊤ := by
  induction s using Finset.cons_induction <;> simp [*]

name: WithTop.sum_ne_top

lemma sum_ne_top : ∑ i ∈ s, f i ≠ ⊤ ↔ ∀ i ∈ s, f i ≠ ⊤ := by simp
